abilities.name: SCAVENGE
abilities.description: After you gain control of a planet, gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: NOMADIC
abilities.description: You can score objectives even if you do not control the planets in your home system.

base.name: Ragh's Call
base.effect: After you commit 1 or more units to land on a planet: Remove all of the Saar player's ground forces from that planet and place them on a planet controlled by the Saar player.
base.returnCondition: Then return this card to the Saar player.

base.name: Captain Mendosa
base.ability: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to increase the move value of 1 of that player's ships to match the move value of the ship on the game board that has the highest move value

base.name: Rowl Sarrig
base.unlockCondition: Have 3 space docks on the game board
base.ability: When you produce fighters or infantry: You may place each of those units at any of your space docks that are not blockaded

base.name: Gurno Aggero
base.ability: ACTION: Choose 1 system that is adjacent to 1 of your Space Docks. Destroy all other players' infantry and fighters in that system. Then, purge this card.
